title: Obim34
author: Obim34
content: Just an upcoming youtuber advocating for people to purchase Bitcoin even for at least a dollar, the journey from Bitcoin equivalent to a dollar and Bitcoin currently $100K is too wide that even critics are beginning to change from their aggressions.Now, imagine being begged to purchase what will create you fortunes, same happened 2011 and what do we think about those failing to have a take on Bitcoin  currently? It does look like a great deal because exactly 8 years from now, the price of Bitcoin will look very different just as it is as of today compared to 2011. Clearly, it is false that we can get 1 Bitcoin worth a Dollar no matter how the DIP happens.

comments.author: Btcdeybodi
comments.body: Quote from: Obim34 on January 16, 2025, 09:15:38 AMNow, imagine being begged to purchase what will create you fortunes, same happened 2011 and what do we think about those failing to have a take on Bitcoin  currently? It does look like a great deal because exactly 8 years from now, the price of Bitcoin will look very different just as it is as of today compared to 2011.  Like i always say, you can't blame anyone who didn't invest in bitcoin when it was just worth less than a dollar because how can you convince people that such an asset will experience long term future growth and they just believe you like that? Just like some altcoins are less than a dollar now and someone tries to persuade you to invest in them that they have long term future growth, will you gladly invest in them just because same thing happened to bitcoin? We should be very realistic when we are deliberating on something because most of us like to see the level of success of something before we can get a convincing spirit to invest so i don't blame anyone who got the privilege to invest when the price was less than a dollar. The only people i will blame in the future are those who after seeing the price performance of bitcoin over the years, still remain adamant and didn't invest and then start regretting when the price must have gotten to $1M.

I don't know his bitcoin stack but one thing that is certain is that if he was certain of the point bitcoin will get to at this point and if he had enough resource that he can put into bitcoin at that time, he would have certainly invested more than he currently holds at the moment. even if investing massively at the present can recreate the kind of profit earlier investors have, you still have to invest with an amount that will allow you to do other things and not tie yourself down till years to come. this is the reason why while investing, you can just stay glued to using the DCA method so you can comfortably stay invested for the long run.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: We in the crypto community consider Bitcoin a safe investment, thus we can never talk about a reality without Bitcoin. Therefore, it has a value that will increase over time and the demand for its use as a store of value or as a payment system increases. At the same time, it is not possible to convince someone outside the crypto community of the importance of Bitcoin and that it is a relatively safe investment. Bitcoin investments are still included among high-risk investments that require caution in deciding when to buy and when to sell, as you cannot imagine that all those who benefit from the price increase are long-term investors. During the last 10 years, many investors lose their investment in btc because they couldn't resist a drop at a certain stage.

comments.author: pooya87
comments.body: Every time bitcoin starts rising up and sets a new ATH, I see topics like this which are good reminders of how far we've gotten. But I always like to remind people in such topics that this is not the end of the ATH records. Because people tend to look at the old and much lower price and think "there will never be the same rise ever again". Like the rise from $1 to $100,000.But they always think that. They thought the same when price first reached $1 from $0.001. They thought that when price reached $10 then $100 then $1000 and finally they will say the same thing in a while when price reaches $1 million This will go on until mass adoption and we are not yet there...
